pathAssistantSteps.info: This ‘Collaboration’ stage enables you to engage with the organisations or industry partners for research commercialisation

The 'Contract' stage signifies that the client has accepted the proposal and is ready to formalise agreement with a Contract with QUT.

Use the Contracts Lifecycle Management System (CLMS) to create and manage the contract process.

This ‘Negotiate’ stage enables you to engage and negotiate with the organisations or industry partners for research commercialisation deal.

Use Negotiation outcome field to capture the outcome of this stage
